channel.title: Looking for a hoster!
channel.description:
Unfortunatley, I am not going to be able to support the abbysalscape server soon so I am looking for a trustworthy hoster, but note, you will not be able to code I will give you a file with the abbysalscape CLASS files, and a runserver file, wich will still enable you to host. However, You will have access to people's accounts. YOU MUST BE A SENIOR MEMBER! this is for security. and you must also be able to host a server almost 24/7. please reply soon.
thanks,
- abbysal
Remember your computer can't lag alot.
I will reply to ANYONE immediatley

item.title: Looking for a hoster!
